sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ILoginData } from '../Interface/ilogin-data'; import { AuthService } from '../Services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'] }) export class LoginComponent { isLogged: boolean = false; constructor(private svc: AuthService){ } ngOnInit() { this.checkLog() } checkLog() { let user = localStorage.getItem('user'); if (user) { this.isLogged = true; } } data: ILoginData= { email:'', password:'' } login(){ this.svc.login(this.data).subscribe(); } }
